Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: U455 - THE MYSTERY OF THE LOST SUBMARINE
Clip.Episode: U455 - The Mystery of the Lost Submarine
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In summer 2008, a mysterious submarine was discovered off the coast of Italy at 120 meters deep. For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: MENZIES AND CHURCHILL AT WAR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Robert Menzies to London during the dark months of 1941 as he takes on Winston Churchill, the British Prime Minister, over the strategic direction of the war, as the fate of Australia hangs in the balance

Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

For Lorenzo del Veneziano, an underwater marine archeologist, it was an amazing sight, as the submarine was intact! Could this be the wreck of the long lost U-455, the last missing German U-boat from World War II?

Clip.Title: OPERATION MINCEMEAT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Based on the best-selling book, Operation Mincemeat reveals the most successful deception of World War II that has been shrouded in secrecy for more than sixty years.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Progeny of the Queen Sheba: Yemen & Saudi Arabia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: With the end of the civil war, the people of Yemen are now building a new country and excavating the remains of the palace of the Queen of Sheba as a way of regaining Yemeni ethnic pride.

Clip.Title: MLK: THE ASSASSINATION TAPES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the last days of Dr. Martin Luther King told through rare television and radio news accounts, many not seen or heard since 1968.

Clip.Title: THE HUNT FOR BIN LADEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The inside story of the 20-year, billion dollar hunt for Osama bin Laden is revealed, featuring accounts from White House, intelligence, and military leaders involved in his capture.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Heading Southwest from the Fraser Canyon - BC's lower Mainland is a mix of remote mountain ranges, spectacular cityscapes and diverse Marine life - as the Fraser River meets the open waters of the Pacific.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: TERROR IN THE SKIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Footage from the cockpit and cabins of troubled planes shows how tiny cracks, loose bolts, and other small issues have caused big problems for airliners.

Clip.Title: CIVIL WAR 360
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Take a journey back in time and immerse yourself in a 150-year-old battle that nearly split our nation in two. This three-part series explores famous and little known aspects of the Civil War, from the perspectives of the Union, the Confederacy and the millions of enslaved people struggling for freedom. Hosted by Ashley Judd, Trace Adkins, and Dennis Haysbert, all of whom had ancestors greatly affected by the war, this series delivers fresh insights and untold tales, brought to life through dramatic recreations and the Smithsonian Institution's vast collection of artifacts.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.
